resources.string:
You just woke up from a scary dream. 
As you open your eyes you look around and you find yourself trapped into a small dark room. 
The room is empty and on the other side of the room you see a shadow with large green eyes looking at you. 
Suddenly the shadow starts speaking: 
Hello stranger. 
I am Zurtok the mighty and you are my prisoner. 
If you want to leave this room alive you must answer correctly my six questions. 
If you fail you will die...
 You can however choose the category of the answers. 
Decide wisely as your life depends on it....
Tell me your Name or suffer the consequences!

As long as you chose the category the shadow split into peaces. 
It changed to all kinds of shapes and sizes. 
From tall temples to maps and tools. \Even though the green eyes, that stood at you, disappeared you can still feel the ill intentions of the shadow... 
Once again Zurtok's voice spread through the room, this time coming from all the peaces together. 
I hope for your sake that you chose correctly... 
Now lets begin with the questions..
This is my first qestion. \nWhen did Christopher Columbus reach America for the first time?
Ok. Next... \nWho was the god of thunder in greek mythology?
Don\'t think that i will go easy on you.... The next one is tricky... \nWhich of the names below belong to norse mythology gods?
